landing.title: Course Registration
landing.description: Course registration made easier than ever! With our intelligent course selection system, you can quickly and efficiently plan your semester without any hassle.

landing.feature1.title: Class Overlap Detection
landing.feature1.description: One of the main concerns for students is overlapping class schedules. Our intelligent system checks your selections to ensure no time conflicts.

landing.feature2.title: Accurate Scheduling
landing.feature2.description: Easily view your free time slots and add courses to your schedule with precision using our advanced scheduling tools.

about.title: About Us
about.description: Our team has developed an intelligent course registration system to simplify the academic planning process for students, ensuring a stress-free and efficient experience.
about.highlight: With us, course registration is no longer a challenge but a simple and enjoyable step toward academic success.

testimonials.title: What Students Say About Our System

client1.name: Ali Hosseini
client1.feedback: Using the course registration system was an excellent and stress-free experience. I easily planned my next semester, and the user interface was great!

client2.name: Zahra Kamali
client2.feedback: With the advanced registration system, you can select your desired courses quickly and easily, even with just your phone!

client3.name: Mahsa Rezaei
client3.feedback: The new course registration system is the best tool I could ask for. It provides an efficient solution to help me organize my schedule effortlessly.

info.title: Information
info.description: The intelligent course registration system is a practical and modern tool that allows you to plan your academic schedule with high accuracy in the shortest time.

footer.copyright: All rights reserved for this system, and any unauthorized use will be legally pursued.
